sentence.Network_en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentence.Network_en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentence.Network_en: You must have noticed how tired he sometimes looks.
sentence.Network_cn: 你一定注意到他有时候显得特别疲惫。

list.abs: they sometimes stay up all night ., 他们有时彻夜不眠.

When I travel , I sometimes have jet lag for days !, 当我旅行时 , 我有时需几天的时间调时差.

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息：布兰妮第一张专辑《baby one more time》收录歌曲。 1998年布兰妮「爱的初告白。..Baby One More Time」这支音乐录像带造成全球立即的轰动及影响，带领起一股青少年的流行风潮。在《爱的初告白。..Baby One More Time》专辑封面，布兰妮跪在粉红色的背景前，带着她充满天真甜美的笑容摆出迷人的姿态，那时的她，看起来便是一副初生之犊不畏虎的样势。不过，这个形象跟她在音乐录像带中，将学校制服衬衫绑在腰上，一副超

entry.def: You use sometimes to say that something happens on some occasions rather than all the time.

example.ex: During the summer, my skin sometimes gets greasy...
example.tran: 夏天我的皮肤有时候会出油。

example.ex: Sometimes I think he dislikes me...
example.tran: 有时候，我觉得他不喜欢我。

means.word_mean: 1. on certain occasions or in certain cases but not always;

sentences.sentence: "sometimes she wished she were back in England"
"sometimes they come for a month; at other times for six months"

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes defeat is snatched from the jaws of victory.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes defeat is snatched from the jaws of victory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes defeat is snatched from the jaws of victory.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes, however, statistics are simply not enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes, however, statistics are simply not enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes, however, statistics are simply not enough.

auth_sentence.content: Now I play every week, sometimes under medication.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now I play every week, sometimes under medication.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now I play every week, sometimes under medication.

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes a new technology doesn't drive the old one out, but only parts of it while forcing the rest to evolve.
Sometimes old technology lingers for centuries because of its symbolic power
Sometimes new technology is a little cranky (不稳定的) at first.
There is another survey, sometimes referred to as the "payroll survey," that assesses 400000 businesses based on their reported payrolls.

The machine would not be a passive participant but would add its own suggestions, information, and opinions; it would sometimes take the initiative in developing or changing the topic and would have a personality of its own.

The machine would not be a passive participant but would add its own suggestions, information, and opinions; it would sometimes take the initiative in developing or changing the topic and would have a personality of its own.

jushi.english: Destiny is sometimes cruel, but sometimes kind.
jushi.chinese: 命运有时是残酷的,但有时却是仁慈的。

jushi.english: Sometimes we are busy and sometimes we're not.
jushi.chinese: 有时我们忙,有时我们不忙。

jushi.english: She likes sometimes the one and sometimes the other.
jushi.chinese: 她有时喜欢这个,有时喜欢那个。
